title: Po zakonam voyennogo vremeni
resume: It is July 1941, and the Nazis are advancing towards Kiev. A special squad is tasked with investigating major cases by acting both at the frontline and in the city itself, where rising criminals are joining German subversives in infiltrating the city, while a number of Soviet government representatives are happily profiting from other people’s misery.
